Boa história e combate. O que me perturbou foram apenas alguns segmentos onde me perdi e não sabia o que fazer, e alguns NPC's não obedecerem meus comandos, o que fazia eles morrerem. Foram poucos momentos assim, though.

Half-Life 2 is a perfect sequel. Everything from how the gameplay has evolved from the first Half-Life to an equal combination of frantic combat and smart, thought out routes (For example, the Ravenholm physics puzzles) is an excellent combination. The story about the Combine is a PERFECTLY executed method of making you hate a villain, (And if you see Doctor Breen, tell him I said 'FUCK YOU!') a stellar execution of a simple rebels VS insurmountable odds concept, AND a perfect return of Gordon Freeman. Go play it.

Девятилетняя Аликс приходит в комнату отца. Там, на кровати, лежит Илай, весь перебинтованный в гипсе, живого места на нем нет. Аликс, виновато:
— Папа, извини, я недосмотрела.
Илай:
— Дочка, сколько раз я тебе говорил — отучай своего Пса прыгать ко мне на руки!

Recientemente jugué al primero, y puedo decir que esta segunda entrega es bastante más entretenida y disfrutable. Los niveles plataformeros que me resultaron más frustrantes presentes en el anterior han sido sustituidos por niveles con vehículos que incitan ligeramente a la exploración.

La ambientación, calidad gráfica y controles me parecen mejores. La mecánica de coger elementos del entorno y lanzarlos me resulta muy divertida. Sin embargo, el final me parece menos climático. Sin entrar en spoilers, esperaba algo más épico al estilo del primero.

A pesar del final, he disfrutado bastante del juego y lo recomiendo, al igual que el primero, si quieres aprender un poco de los clásicos que marcaron la industria del videojuego.

Amazing game that still holds up to this date.
Played it for the first time in 2020 and was very surprised at the quality of the game even compared to todays standards.
The physics engine in this game is still the best i have ever encountered, and one can play around with it for hours on end.
A big recommendation from here!

TOP GAME

The single most overrated game of all time.
Do not believe the fanfare and rave reviews, this game is a boring, repetitive, clunky, and mind-numbing excuse for a "game".
Problems are listed from worst to least worse:

1. This game is insanely boring. despite the reviews mentioning graphics, physics, and innovation (which is just plain lies as this game does not have any innovative gameplay features other than the gravity gun. which really stretches the use of the word "innovative") they always seem to forget to mention the most important aspect of any game; FUN. The reason why barely any reviews mention this is because the game simply isn't fun. The lack of fun is mostly caused by an insane lack of difficulty which makes the game seem like it was made for children with severe learning disabilities and the fact that the enemy ai is completely braindead and will just stand while you unload bullets into their face.
2. The shooting isn't satisfying and gets repetitive very quickly. The guns in this game feel worse than the guns in CrimeLife3  and considering the fact that this game is a first-person shooter this is a big no-no.
3. The vehicle sections are atrociously poorly made and way too long. the airboat section: it was not fun, the controls were terrible and it was way too long. The Highway Car section: had driving physics comparable to that of Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing and the jumps you had to do with the car were extremely clunky.
4. The boss fights are really lacking; the boss fights in this game (if you can even call them that )are utterly atrocious from a game design perspective. There is never any kind of indication that you are getting any closer to killing the boss or that you are even doing the right thing. Compare this to a game like Dark Souls where every time you fight a boss you learn something new that helps you defeat them, you always know what you did wrong and how you can improve.
5. Headcrabs: headcrabs are the epitome of poor game design choices in this game; they don't serve any purpose other than to annoy and frustrate the player by wasting their ammo and time
6. Waiting for characters to stop spouting out exposition. why wasn't this skippable

So in conclusion this game really isn't good at all and calling it the best game of all time, as well as Valve's best game, is insulting to actual good games. Praising mediocrity is dangerous because it rewards game developers for not trying.                      

3/10
